dialogue.text: Hello! What are you looking for?
dialogue.zh:
你好! What 是 你 在找 ?
こんにちは! What are あなた 探して for?

dialogue.text: I need something for a headache.
dialogue.zh:
我 需要 東西 a 頭痛.
私 必要 something for a 頭痛.

dialogue.text: Is it a mild headache or severe?
dialogue.zh:
是 it a mild 頭痛 or severe?
私 it a mild 頭痛 or severe?

Mild, but annoying.
Mild, but annoying.

dialogue.text: Do you want acetaminophen or ibuprofen?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 acetaminophen or ibuprofen?
Do あなた want acetaminophen or ibuprofen?

Which one 是 gentler?
Which one 私 gentler?

dialogue.text: Acetaminophen is usually gentler on the stomach.
dialogue.zh:
Acetaminophen 是 usually gentler on the stomach.
Acetaminophen 私 usually gentler on the stomach.

好的, 我’ll take that.
わかりました, 私’ll take that.

你 有 stomach issues?
Do あなた have stomach issues?

Sometimes.
Sometimes.

dialogue.text: Then this is a good choice.
dialogue.zh:
Then this 是 a good choice.
Then this 私 a good choice.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: How often can I take it?
dialogue.zh:
How often 可以 我 take it?
How often できます 私 take it?

dialogue.text: One tablet every six hours if needed.
dialogue.zh:
One tablet every six hours if needed.
One tablet every six hours if needed.

What’s the maximum per day?
What’s the maximum per day?

不 more than four tablets.
いいえ more than four tablets.

dialogue.text: Should I take it with food?
dialogue.zh:
Should 我 take it with food?
Should 私 take it with food?

It’s better with food.
It’s better with food.

dialogue.text: Do you also have muscle pain?
dialogue.zh:
你 also 有 muscle 痛?
Do あなた also have muscle pain?

是的, my shoulders 是 sore.
はい, my shoulders are sore.

dialogue.text: We have a topical gel for muscle pain.
dialogue.zh:
We 有 a topical gel muscle 痛.
We have a topical gel for muscle pain.

That sounds helpful.
That sounds helpful.

dialogue.text: Apply it two or three times a day.
dialogue.zh:
Apply it two or three times a day.
Apply it two or three times a day.

好的.
わかりました.

任何 questions about side effects?
Any questions about side effects?

Will it make me sleepy?
Will it make me sleepy?

dialogue.text: This one won’t, but avoid alcohol.
dialogue.zh:
This one won’t, but avoid alcohol.
This one won’t, but avoid alcohol.

Got it.
Got it.

dialogue.text: Alright, I’ll get these for you.
dialogue.zh:
Alright, 我’ll get these 你.
Alright, 私’ll get these for あなた.

謝謝.
ありがとう.
